com.omega.distributedsupport.coordinator
Interface Elector

All Known Implementing Classes:
HighestHashElector
public interface Elector

Object that provides mechanism/algorithm for selection new master Coordinator object when one goes down.

Author:
Ross Bayer

Method Summary
 java.util.UUID determineNewMaster(java.util.UUID coordinatorUUID, java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> peers)
          Determines the new master Coordinator and returns its UUID.
 int getRank(java.util.UUID coordinatorUUID, java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> peers)
          Determines the rank of the UUID.
 

Method Detail

determineNewMaster

java.util.UUID determineNewMaster(java.util.UUID coordinatorUUID,
                                  java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> peers)
Determines the new master Coordinator and returns its UUID.

Parameters:
coordinatorUUID - The UUID of the Coordinator that invoked the method.
peers - The set of known peers.
Returns:
The UUID of the new master.

getRank

int getRank(java.util.UUID coordinatorUUID,
            java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> peers)
Determines the rank of the UUID. The higher the number, the sooner the Coordinator with the provided UUID will become the master. Ranks start at size of peers + 1, and descend by 1 each.

Parameters:
coordinatorUUID - The UUID of the Coordinator that invoked the method.
peers - The set of known peers.
Returns:
The numerical rank of the coordinator.
